mapper.select: SELECT A.REGTIME, A.PUMCODE, A.LOTNO, A.LOADCNT, A.MESLOT, B.CYCLENO, B.AGITATE_RPM, A.REMARK FROM T_WORKINLINE A INNER JOIN T_PRODUCT B ON A.PUMCODE = B.DOBUN WHERE A.PUMBUN = #{pumbun} AND A.DEVICECODE = #{devicecode} AND A.CUR_LOCATION >= 9 ORDER BY A.LOTNO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE T_WAITLIST SET PLC = '2' WHERE LOTNO = #{lotno}
UPDATE T_SILJUK SET ENDTIME = CONVERT(CHAR(16), GETDATE(), 120) WHERE LOTNO = #{lotno}
UPDATE T_WAITLIST SET PLC = '2' WHERE PLC = '1' AND convert(varchar(10),list_year,120) < CONVERT(varchar(10),GETDATE()-5,120)
DELETE FROM T_WORKINLINE WHERE convert(varchar(10),regtime,120) < CONVERT(varchar(10),GETDATE()-5,120)
